import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { KeyboardContext } from '../Contexts/KeyboardContext'; import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close'; const LeaderBoard = () => { const {leaderBoard, showLeaderBoard} = useContext(KeyboardContext); const {darkMode, setDarkMode} = useContext(KeyboardContext); const {userMode, setUserMode} = useContext(KeyboardContext); const {guestMode, setGuestMode} = useContext(KeyboardContext); function handleX() { showLeaderBoard(!leaderBoard); } return (
